Name: Health
Description: When your health reahes zero you fall unconscious.

Name: Regeneration
Description: How many health points you recover each day.

Name: Recovery
Description: How quickly you recover from poisons and negative effects.

Name: Climbing
Description: The difficulty of objects of which you are able to climb.

Name: Storage
Description: The amount of weight that you can carry.

Name: Encumbrance
Description: How much your are slowed down in combat by your equipment.

Name: Endurance
Description: Number of actions you can perform each day.

Name: Stamina
Description: How many endurance points you recover each day.

Name: Damage minimum
Description: Mimimum damage you do on each hit

Name: Damage maximum
Description: Maximum damage you do on each hit

Name: Speed
Description: How fast you attack.

Name: Accuracy
Description: The chance of your attacks hitting their target.

Name: First strike
Description: Chance to strike first

Name: Killshot
Description: Damage multiplier when performing a critical hit.

Name: Precision
Description: Ability to critically hit enemies.

Name: Defence
Description: Amount of all damage reduced.

Name: Evade
Description: Chance to dodge.

Name: Parry
Description: Chance to parry.

Name: Flee
Description: Chance to run from a battle.

Name: Riposte
Description: Chance to riposte an enemy attack.

Name: Fatigue
Description: How quickly you tire in combat.

Name: Block
Description: Ability to block if a shield is equipped.

Name: Stealth
Description: Chance to avoid detection.

Name: Pickpocketing
Description: Skill at stealing from others.

Name: Faith
Description: Strength of spells you cast.

Name: Sanctity
Description: Amount of sanctity you can have.

Name: Redemption
Description: Amount of sanctity you recover each day.

Name: Resist holy
Description: Ability to resist holy damage

Name: Bartering
Description: Discount from negotiating prices.

Name: Oration
Description: Proficiency in speaking to others.

Name: Charm
Description: How quickly other people will like you.

Name: Trustworthiness
Description: How much other players trust you.

Name: Renown
Description: How much your actions affect your reputation.

Name: Knowledge
Description: Ability to understand.

Name: Literacy
Description: Ability to read.

Name: Understanding
Description: How much more quickly you level up.

Name: Luckiness
Description: Chance to have things turn your way against all odds.

Name: Adventuring
Description: Chance to discover treasure.

Name: Logistics
Description: How far you can move on the map

Name: Mountaineering
Description: Modifier for mountain movement.

Name: Woodsman
Description: Modifier for forest movement.

Name: Navigator
Description: Modifier for water movement.

Name: Detection
Description: Chance to discover enemy stealth and traps.

Name: Caution
Description: See information about a new grid before going there

Name: Explorer
Description: Additional options on the map such as foraging

Name: Huntsman
Description: Learn additional information about enemies.

Name: Survivalist
Description: Create bandages and other useful objects

Name: Resist frost
Description: Ability to resist frost damage

Name: Resist flame
Description: Ability to resist flame damage

Name: Resist shadow
Description: Ability to resist shadow damage

Name: Resist poison
Description: Ability to resist poison damage

Name: Resist blunt
Description: Ability to resist blunt damage

Name: Resist slashing
Description: Ability to resist slashing damage

Name: Resist piercing
Description: Ability to resist piercing damage

Name: Courage
Description: Your ability to overcome fears.

Name: Sanity
Description: Your ability to resist mind altering affects.
